attributes.action: Legislate to introduce an annual "Referendum Day"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister to introduce Annual Referendum Day on which, each year,  3 national policy matters and 3 local matters (district by district) -  chosen by on-line and telephone polling - will be submitted by referendum for public approval.  The issues receiving 50 per cent support will then have to be debated and  Parliament and local councils will have to say why they should not be implemented if those are their decisions..
